DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - To evaluate Heart Failure Risk Status ( HFRS ) feature performance . - To establish feasibility remote follow-up patient risk triaging perform nurse-led review HFRS feature supplemental information .
DOC.criteria: Patients meet following criterion could include study : Implant commercially available Medtronic CRTD ICD device without Optivol Fluid Status Monitoring feature . Inclusion Medtronic Carelink Network . Local consent available CL network well general local consent available use data observational study sign informative sheet deliver . Patients age 18 year .
